metadata.title: Vintage Rides Andes | Motorcycle Tours in Peru | Discover the South on 2 Wheels
metadata.description: Exclusive motorcycle tours in southern Peru. Explore Machu Picchu, Lake Titicaca, Colca Canyon and the Andes. 15 years of experience. Tours from 5 to 13 days.

emblematico.title: SIGNATURE TOUR
emblematico.subtitle: 11 days, 2,000 km
emblematico.description: Designed by our partner VINTAGE RIDES from France, riders experience an incredible immersion in Spanish (Arequipa) and Inca (Cusco, Machu Picchu) cultures, crossing off-the-beaten-path landscapes, from the western volcanic chain, to the altiplano with Lake Titicaca and the Amazon rainforest. Can you imagine going from 4,725m at the foot of glaciers to 600m in the jungle in less than 2 hours? Only in Peru!

alacarte.title: CUSTOM TOURS
alacarte.subtitle: Your personalized adventure
alacarte.description: Arequipa is the ideal starting point to explore the Andes. Within hours, riders travel from the Pacific coast to the Atacama desert, the Andean altiplano, Bolivian salt flats, and the Amazon rainforest. Vintage Rides Andes customizes tours from 1 day to as long as time allows, for solo riders and groups up to 10 friends.

canones.title: CANYONS & VOLCANOES
canones.subtitle: Extreme Arequipa
canones.description: Cross the deepest canyons in the Americas and ride around imposing volcanoes. An extreme adventure in the heart of the southern Andes.

desierto.title: DESERT & BEACHES
desierto.subtitle: Peruvian Coast
desierto.description: Explore the contrast between coastal desert and Pacific beaches. A route that combines sand, sun, and the magic of the Peruvian coast.

about.title: What makes us different
about.description: For over 15 years, we've shared the passion for motorcycle travel. We know every route, every viewpoint, every secret that southern Peru hides.

1.title: We're in
1.content: We're part of the VINTAGE RIDES family, the famous motorcycle travel agency. Headquartered in Lyon, France, it started 20 years ago in India and today offers over 100 tours in 15 countries around the world.

2.title: The adventure
2.subtitle: 48 years ago
2.content: For the past 48 years, Jean-Louis Gelot, French mechanical and geophysical engineer, traveled the world searching for minerals and hydrocarbons. In 2016, he settled in Arequipa, Peru. In 2020, he created VINTAGE RIDES ANDES.

3.title: More than
3.subtitle: explored the Andes
3.content: Since 2021, assured of finding confirmed guides, logistics support, and ready mechanics, riders came from France, Switzerland, Germany, UK, USA, Belgium, Australia, Ukraine, and many more countries.

4.title: The secrets of the
4.subtitle: of the Andes
4.content: With 8,500 km from the Caribbean to Tierra del Fuego, the Andes Cordillera is the longest in the world. A refuge for over 100 natural ecosystems.

5.title: A journey through
5.subtitle: of history
5.content: Humans developed great cultures like Caral 5,000 years ago, and Inca 500 years ago. Spanish conquest and migrations created today's diverse culture.
